timeline.bodyText: This compared a trimmed string to an untrimmed string.  So: it always failed when passed an untrimmed string
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: you want xpath options?  here's another
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.message: Add quotation marks to make text comparison more explicit

timeline.bodyText: @aweng98 @freemabd @freemabd1 this appears to solve the extra-space issue
